name: Psikodelya
description:
Explore multiple dimensions in a psychedelic world. Solve puzzles and overcome obstacles on gravity-defying platforms.

Welcome to trippy world of Psikodelya!




Psikodelya is a first-person puzzle game designed for the player to explore the surrounding world.




  • Original Psychedelic Soundtrack
  • Explore surreal worlds
  • Puzzles
  • Gravity-defying Platforms
  • Psychedelic Experience
  • Trippy Game



Photosensitive epileptic seizures warning! A small percentage of people may experience a seizure when exposed to certain visual images, including flashing lights or patterns that appear in videogames.
